TermDesc:
Max 120 points.
During Kaleidoscopic Parade:
- Restore 20% of Lumiflow per second while Lynae is moving on the ground or casting Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack, Kaleidoscopic Parade - Ground Heavy Attack, Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Heavy Attack, Additive Color, Dodge, Intro Skill, or Basic Attack - To a Vivid Tomorrow!.
- Lumiflow starts to deplete by 20% per second when Lynae is on the ground/climbing/swimming or off the field, or after a certain time after the skills listed above are cast.
- Lumiflow does not change while Lynae is not in any of the states described above.
Exiting Kaleidoscopic Parade removes all Lumiflow.
Exiting Kaleidoscopic Parade removes all Lumiflow.
With 120 points of Lumiflow, Lynae skates at full speed.
